data.name: FrmOptions_I_don_t_know_anything_about_your_monitor_arrangement_in_extended_mode__Next_time__I_will_take_a_copy_of_your_settings_before_changing_to_surround_mode_
data.value: I don't know anything about your monitor arrangement in extended mode. Next time, I will take a copy of your settings before changing to surround mode.

data.name: FrmOptions_I_took_a_copy_of_your_settings_last_time_you_was_in_extended_mode__So_I_may_have_an_idea_about_your_desired_configuration__Click_here_to_remove_this_data_and_to_ask_you_again_later_to_reorganize_your_setup_
data.value: I took a copy of your settings last time you was in extended mode. So I may have an idea about your desired configuration. Click here to remove this data and to ask you again later to reorganize your setup.

data.name: FrmOptions_I_have_no_idea_about_your_surround_settings__I_will_ask_you_about_it_the_next_time_you_tried_to_enable_the_surround_mode_
data.value: I have no idea about your surround settings. I will ask you about it the next time you tried to enable the surround mode.

data.name: FrmOptions_I_believe_that_I_have_an_idea_about_how_you_expect_your_surround_setup_to_be__If_you_think_that_I_am_wrong__click_here_and_I_will_ask_you_about_it_the_next_time_you_tried_to_enable_the_surround_mode_
data.value: I believe that I have an idea about how you expect your surround setup to be. If you think that I am wrong, click here and I will ask you about it the next time you tried to enable the surround mode.

data.name: FrmOptions_Sometimes__and_especially_when_I_get_confused__I_may_do_things_that_I_did_not_intended_to_do__Like_messing_with_your_taskbar_and_NVIDIA_control_panel__If_something_like_that_happened_to_you__click_here_and_I_do_my_best_to_make_it_right_
data.value: Sometimes, and especially when I get confused, I may do things that I did not intended to do. Like messing with your taskbar and NVIDIA control panel. If something like that happened to you, click here and I do my best to make it right.

data.name: FrmOptions_I_tried_to_solve_the_problems__you_happy_now_
data.value: I tried to solve the problems, you happy now?

data.name: FrmTools_Failed_to_create_the_shortcut__Unexpected_exception_occurred_
data.value: Failed to create the shortcut. Unexpected exception occurred.

data.name: FrmTools_Toggles_the_display_mode_between_surround_and_extended
data.value: Toggles the display mode between surround and extended

data.name: FrmTools_Changes_the_display_mode_to_surround
data.value: Changes the display mode to surround

data.name: FrmTools_Changes_the_display_mode_to_extended
data.value: Changes the display mode to extended

data.name: FrmTools_Bad_file_selected__Please_select_an_executable_file_
data.value: Bad file selected. Please select an executable file.

data.name: FrmSplash_While_I_am_working__do_not_play_with_mouse_and_keyboard__This_is_a_serious_job_
data.value: While I am working, do not play with mouse and keyboard. This is a serious job.

data.name: FrmSplash_There_is_no_active_splash_screen_
data.value: There is no active splash screen.

data.name: Program_Can_not_open_a_named_pipe_for_IPC_
data.value: Can not open a named pipe for IPC.

data.name: Program_Another_instance_of_this_program_is_in_working_state__please_try_again_later_
data.value: Another instance of this program is in working state, please try again later.

data.name: Program_You_can_t_start_a_process_in_extended_mode_when_you_have_another_process_in_surround_mode__Close_the_other_program_and_try_again_
data.value: You can't start a process in extended mode when you have another process in surround mode. Close the other program and try again.

data.name: Program_You_can_t_start_a_process_in_surround_mode_when_you_have_another_process_in_extended_mode__Close_the_other_program_and_try_again_
data.value: You can't start a process in surround mode when you have another process in extended mode. Close the other program and try again.

data.name: Surround_Arrangement_panel_is_not_accessible_from_our_side__can_t_save_your_settings_
data.value: Arrangement panel is not accessible from our side, can't save your settings.

data.name: Surround_Failed_to_change_the_surround_settings_
data.value: Failed to change the surround settings.

data.name: Surround_NVIDIA_Control_Panel_is_absent_on_this_system_
data.value: NVIDIA Control Panel is absent on this system.

data.name: Surround_Can_t_find_the_surround_checkbox_
data.value: Can't find the Surround RadioButton (WIP for SLI)

data.name: Surround_Can_t_find_the_sli_checkbox_
data.value: Can't find the Enable SLI RadioButton (WIP for SLI)

data.name: Surround_Can_t_find_the_apply_button_
data.value: Can't find the Apply Button (WIP for SLI)

data.name: Surround_Can_t_find_the_surround_button_
data.value: Can't find the Surround Configure Button (WIP for SLI)
